QuestData.Title: The Fallen Guardian
QuestData.Description: Fandral Staghelm was kept prisoner here in Hyjal. It was the green dragon Alysra - one of my very own! - who was in charge of keeping Fandral secure.$B$BWe can only conclude that the Twilight's Hammer has gotten to her. You must confront her, $n. Destroy her if you must - I cannot bear to see it.$B$BShe was last seen in the Ruins of Lar'donir, west of the World Tree.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront and slay Alysra at the Ruins of Lar'donir in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: Alysra has been brought to justice, but from her mangled remains emerged something else. A creature of living flame, twisted to serve the will of the Firelord.$B$BYou suspect your paths may someday cross again.
